Title: Establishes minimum staffing levels for local board of elections
Summary: Requires every board of elections to employ a minimum of four full time employees in addition to the appointed commissioners within four years and shall employ two of those full time employees within two years; and two additional employees for every twenty thousand active registered voters beyond forty thousand active registered voters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to establishing minimum staffing levels for local board of elections
